resources.string: My name is Jared Thibodeaux. "\n"My love for programming was kickstarted with discovery of my all time favorite game - EverQuest."\n"I enjoy mobile development and have been over iOS and Android mobile teams for the last 3 years. Although I have also done Windows based applications, I wouldn\'t want to leave mobile development.

* Java"
